definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: Blend egg with 2 tbsp of mungbean flour. Add in chicken and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋加生粉2汤匙拌匀成浓糊状，加入鸡块拦匀。

sentences.english: Hike a mile with a backpack full of cold fried chicken and biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 背一大包油煎鸡块和饼干步行一英里。

sentences.english: If at first you don't fricassee, fry, fry a hen. (RD)
sentences.chinese: 如果开始做不成白汁鸡块，就炸一只鸡试试。

sentences.english: He was dipping the chicken in the butter.
sentences.chinese: 只见他拿鸡块蘸黄油吃。

sentences.english: Rinse lettuce, then shred it. Place on a plate, put chicken on top.
sentences.chinese: 生菜洗净，切成丝，放在碟中，上面放上鸡块。

sentences.english: Give me a Chicken McNuggets meal with hot mustard sauce.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份麦克鸡块餐，配辣芥末酱。

sentences.english: Then throw in the garlic and scallions and sprinkle the thyme over the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 然后放入蒜和葱，并在鸡块上撒上百里香。

sentences.english: Put the chicken in the pan.
Theyare sweet and sour pork, almond junket, shrimp omelet and Chickeninsweet and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉点了糖醋排骨，杏仁豆腐，虾仁煎蛋和糖醋鸡块。

sentences.english: You deserve a hands-free break. Pour the soda pop into the cup, place the tray on top, put your nuggets in there, then pop in a few bendy straws!
sentences.chinese: 把汽水倒入杯中，再放上硬托盘，放些鸡块在上面。

sentences.english: Between these chicken fights, Lorlene took me out on tours of the city.
sentences.chinese: 在这些吃着鸡块的争吵之余，劳莱恩带我游览了城市。

sentences.english: Cut into slices breaded fried chicken breast served with french fires.
sentences.chinese: 我们有名的面包屑炸鸡块配薯条。

sentences.english: Pierce each piece of chicken with the fork. Press it and move it around the pan in order to absorb the sugar.
sentences.chinese: 用叉子将鸡块刺破，按着在锅中来回移动以吸收糖分。

sentences.english: Can I have a BigMac Combo and a twenty-piece chicken nuggets?
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份麦香堡套餐和一份20块鸡块。

sentences.english: Then I had lunch. I had some [McDonald's chicken] nuggets.
sentences.chinese: 我吃一些麦当劳的炸鸡块。

definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
